CustomField.description:
This field is used to show the Icons for Metering Field Workers Schedule List screen on mobile
Updated as a part of SFS-5426
CustomField.formula: IF( FSM_BusinessUnit__c = "Metering", IF( ROUND((ArrivalWindowEndTime - ArrivalWindowStartTime ) * 24,0) = 2, "2Ô∏è‚É£", "") & IF( FSM_CustomerAppointment__c = True, "üïë", "") & IF( OR(Contains(FSM_StandardTextKey__c,"NHH"), Contains(FSM_StandardTextKey__c,"NHME"),Contains(FSM_StandardTextKey__c,"CRN")),"üè≠","") & IF( FSM_SameStartAppointmentDependencyExists__c = True, "üë¨", "") & IF( FSM_AppointmentDependencyExists__c = True, "üîó", "") & IF( NOT(IsBlank(FSM_ConstraintStart__c)) ,"üìÜ","") & IF( FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Case.FSM_VulnerableCustomer__c = True, "ü§≤", "") , "")
CustomField.label: Icon for Metering
